group_1.textCenter: Over here is where the fortunes are sold.

group_1.textLeft: T-thank you...

group_1.textRight: Oh, so it was over here.@There's a lot of people.
The fortunes here are just so popular~@"Super Fortune," was it?

group_1.textLeft: You're off, Mom.@It's "Ultimate Fortune."
Ultimate, that's the important part.

group_1.textRight: Rui sure loves these fortunes, huh.

group_1.textCenter: [chara:800700:effect_shake]You gotta try it too, Dad.@You'll see just how amazing they are...

group_1.textRight: I get it, I get it. Don't pull me.

group_1.textLeft: Ohh? It's Rui!
Hap New Year!
Today I just got back from my parents' house,@so I'm in my apartment in Kamihama again~

group_1.textRight: A-awa... Hap...n...new...y-year...

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Sup?

group_1.textRight: Oh, you're Rui's friend? Good day.
Thank you for always looking after my daughter.

group_1.textLeft: I should say the same!

group_1.textRight: W-waaaiiit~...!

group_1.textLeft: W-what going on? You're actin' up even@more...than...usual...
Ah, is it because of my senpais?@This is your first time meeting them.
It's all good, they're both really nice people.

group_1.textRight: Th-that's not it...
Y-you know, when your friend group sees you@with your parents...
...Isn't it just too embarrassing?

group_1.textLeft: ...Is it?
Is this one of Mihono's classmates?@[chara:303801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303801:cheek_0][chara:303801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303801:lipSynch_1]...Or rather, are you okay...?

group_1.textRight: Yep!
She's just embarrassed to be seen with her parents.

group_1.textLeft: So that's it. I feel like I can understand...
But don't people outgrow things like that@in middle school?

group_1.textRight: [chara:305601:effect_shake]G-gulp...

group_1.textLeft: It's just as my senpais said, you don't need to be@so embarassed.
It's perfectly normal to make your first shrine visit@with your parents!
It's true, I've gone to the local shrine with my family.

group_1.textRight: Even if someone were to laugh at you,
you could always just ignore them.
T-thank you...for such kind support...
By the way, Seira...@W-why are you here...?

group_1.textLeft: Eh, well obviously...

group_1.textRight: You're going home...for New Year's...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, on New Year's Eve. Then I'll be doing my first@shrine visit.

group_1.textRight: How nice.

group_1.textLeft: What're you doing?@For your first shrine visit, I mean.

group_1.textRight: For my first shrine visit...@I'm going to Mizuna Shrine.

group_1.textLeft: Is it still standard for the people of Kamihama City@to go there?

group_1.textRight: That's right... The fortunes there are always@fascinating.
They're called "Ultimate fortunes,"@and they're all kinds of amazing.
There's inflation now because massive luck@and infinite luck are the hot topic.

group_1.textLeft: Hehh~ I gotta tell my senpais!
Then my senpais said the whole club should go.

group_1.textRight: When you spread everything and anything...@once it goes public, things like this happen.

group_1.textLeft: Now, fortune, get your fortune!@I got universal great luck!

group_1.textRight: Ah, so you already drew yours.@That one is a good omen.

group_1.textLeft: You're about to draw one, right?@I hope you get some great luck!

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'm aiming for terrible luck.
Even more than that...the terrible luck beyond@terrible luck... The murderously evil black dragon@terrible luck, you know...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, go for it.
The same naming as usual, I see.

group_1.textRight: She's sure got an open mind.
I've obtained it...@N-now to open it.....[chara:305601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305601:cheek_0][chara:305601:motion_100][chara:305601:lipSynch_1] Ei.
Lucky...

group_1.textLeft: Plain and simple!

group_1.textRight: Ughh...

group_1.textLeft: W-well it's not bad...right?
It's so ordinary, that it's actually more precious.
Inside! What's written inside is what's important!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...

group_1.narration: Like the scattered sakura petals@throughout a world@without a god's salvation,@follow the strong winds@that are more pure than any love.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: What's that supposed to mean...
It means that you should stay positive even when@you're in low spirits.
That's not a bad saying.

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah... Thank you very much.

group_1.textCenter: (Sakura are...pink...red and white...@The red and white shrine maiden's dress...!)
(God's salvation...the god is...at the shrine...@And salvation is...being saved...helped...)

group_1.textRight: We're only shrine maidens for a limited time...@We're actually temporary helpers.

group_1.narration: This is terrible...!@Those shrine maidens are in danger...!
I must go see the aspect of death...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...why're you reading it again so closely...?
